author: Pamela Muse
text:
The City of Phoenix, AZ is looking for information on increasing the participation rate in paperless billing programs for municipal services/utilities?  We want to increase the number of customers who use paperless billing as a way to decrease printing and mailing costs.  How are other agencies increasing their participating rate?  
Thank you! 
Samuel Feldman
Management intern
City of Phoenix
602.262.7704
sam.feldman@phoenix.gov
title: Increase Utility Paperless Billing Participation
